title: Coconut Curry Lentil Soup
steps: In a large pot over medium heat, saut√© onion and garlic for 5 minutes.
Add lentils and stir for about 1 minute.
Add remaining ingredients and increase heat to high.
After the soup comes to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 12 minutes.
In a fry pan over medium-low heat, toast almonds until they just begin to brown. Remove from heat immediately.
Garnish soup with almonds and serve.
